title: What do you eat to stay awake while driving? - Quora

response.answer_text: I once drove 50 hrs straight from Seattle to Annapolis, only stopping for gas and food. Yea… not a good idea. To stay awake, I was sipping on coffee and smoking cigarettes every 30min or so. Mind you, I’ve never been a habitual consumer of coffee or tobacco. It was terrible to my body but it worked. I would never try my luck on anything so unnecessary again.
